name: Hungry Hole
description: Guide a growing hole to consume progressively larger objects, scaling from tiny items to entire buildings.

name: Merge Explode
description: Drop balls that merge on contact and explode at mega tier with chain reactions.

name: OP Weapons
description: Destroy enemy waves with 5 absurdly overpowered weapons.

name: Power Wash
description: Spray water to clean dirty surfaces with satisfaction mechanics.

name: Ragdoll Launcher
description: Slingshot ragdolls at destructible structures for combo scores.

name: Too Many
description: Spawn ragdolls down an obstacle course, control chaos with spawn rate slider.

name: Stack Panic
description: Catch falling blocks to build wobbly towers while dodging hazards, then watch your tower survive an earthquake to score.

name: Stack Thief
description: Swipe to steal blocks from wobbling towers and stack them onto yours before everything topples.

name: Lava Rise
description: Wall-jump between two narrowing walls to outrun rising lava, dodging obstacles and grabbing coins as the climb gets faster and tighter.

name: Orbit Keeper
description: Tap to launch moons into orbit around planets, building a spinning solar system while avoiding collisions between your own orbiting bodies.

name: Bounce Back
description: Aim and release a bouncing ball into a pachinko-style arena of pegs, bumpers, and multiplier zones to rack up the highest score before running out of balls.

name: Shrink Ray
description: Aim a shrink ray to miniaturize oncoming obstacles before they crush you, but shrunk objects become fast ricocheting projectiles you must also dodge.

name: Flip Tide
description: Tap to flip gravity for your surfer between the ocean surface and the ceiling of an underwater cave, threading through gaps in coral above and waves below.

name: Claim Rush
description: Race to paint the arena floor your color by dragging paths behind you, enclosing regions to claim territory while avoiding AI rivals who cut across your trails.

name: Fold Over
description: Fold a paper sheet along lines to stack colored layers, matching a target pattern in as few folds as possible.

name: Rope Rescue
description: Fling rope lines between anchor points to build bouncy safety nets that catch falling survivors before they hit the ground.

name: Splice Sprint
description: Race forward on a procedural track that constantly splits into forking paths â€” swipe to pick your lane before each fork, chaining the best route through speed boosts, jumps, and shortcuts while wrong picks dead-end or slow you down.

name: Hex Clash
description: Place colored hex tiles to surround and capture enemy hexes, battling an AI opponent for board control in fast 60-second matches.

name: Spark Gap
description: Draw wire paths to connect sparking terminals before the charge drains, routing electricity through a cluttered circuit board while avoiding shorts that blow your fuses.

name: Echo Hunt
description: Send out sonar pings to reveal hidden creatures in a dark ocean, then tap to catch them before they fade back into the black â€” but each ping also wakes up predators that chase your signal.

name: Frost Line
description: Drag to draw ice walls that freeze and redirect a bouncing fireball, shielding fragile snowflakes while deflecting the ball into fire demons to destroy them.

name: Drift Dodge
description: Steer a drifting car through oncoming traffic by holding to curve left or right, building up a near-miss combo multiplier that boosts your score but also increases your speed.

name: Swarm Split
description: Drag to slice your swarm of critters into groups, sending squads to overwhelm enemy bases before they regroup â€” split too thin and you lose, stay bunched and you're too slow.
